com.hotels.styx.api

Class Announcer<T extends EventListener>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotels.styx.api.Announcer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the event listeners notified by this announcer

    public class Announcer<T extends EventListener>
extends Object
    A listener that propagates events to a list of event listeners that can be added or removed after the Announcer is constructed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Announcer(Class<? extends T> listenerType)
      Constructs an announcer with the specified listener type.

      Removes the given listener from this Announcer.
      static <T extends EventListener>
      Announcer<T>      		 to(Class<? extends T> listenerType)
